author: undetermined
full_text:
Sanjay Raut urges UN to declare June 20 as 'World Traitors Day'

Shiv Sena (UBT) leader Sanjay Raut has written to the United Nations urging it to declare June 20 as 'World Traitors Day' to mark the "desertion" of his party chief Uddhav Thackeray by 40 Shiv Sena MLAs, including Maharashtra Chief Minister Eknath Shinde.

It was on this day last year that Maharashtra Chief Minister Eknath Shinde's revolt led to a split in the Shiv Sena. Meanwhile, the members of Shiv Sena (UBT) and NCP are observing June 20 as 'Traitor Day'.
title: Sanjay Raut urges UN to declare June 20 as 'World Traitors Day',Shiv Sena (UBT) leader Sanjay Raut has written to the United Nations urging it to declare June 20 as 'World Traitors Day' to mark the “desertion” of his party chief Uddhav Thackeray by 40 Shiv Sena MLAs, including Maharashtra Chief Minister Eknath Shinde.
vclaim: Sanjay Raut has written to the UN requesting June 20 to be declared as 'World Traitors Day' in response to the Shiv Sena split. The date June 20 marks when 40 Shiv Sena MLAs, led by Eknath Shinde, left Uddhav Thackeray's leadership in 2022. Shiv Sena (UBT) and NCP members are observing June 20 as 'Traitor Day'.
